Shipr In Blog

How WordPress can get stuck

There are just too many ways which you can screw up your word-press installation. A small change in the domain name can also create weird changes. For someone who is not used to word-press structures it is a moment of panic. But the best part about word-press is that at any stage you can really save all the posts and data even if the whole website crashes. Thus, if you are a novice who is really not sure about what you have done and have got your word-press installation or the blog down, don’t worry much. Just get your friend who has spent enough time on word-press and you can be sure of having your blog back on track.

Apr 10, 2010 •

How to improve concentration

Concentration is something that can seriously decide the effectiveness of the amount of effort that you put into your work. If you are being haunted by the question about how to improve your concentration, then you are right here on ‘Thinking Different’ for an answer. If you believed that slow steady solution are better than fast ones, then you should take my word. Constant practice is the key to remembering things. Any medicine can cause you more harm over a long run. Try shouting out the names and things you want to remember. You can also write down things that you want to remember. Over a period of time you will notice that you can still simulate the effect of shouting out or writing down even without literally doing so. This is the point when you will slowly start remembering things and will increase your concentration too.

Apr 4, 2010 •
